def_cn: 感恩节(美国的公共假日，在 11 月的第四个星期四)
def_en: In the United States, Thanksgiving or Thanksgiving Day is a public holiday on the fourth Thursday in November. It was originally a day when people celebrated the end of the harvest and thanked God for it.

def_cn: (尤指在宗教仪式中对上帝的)感恩，感恩祈祷
def_en: Thanksgiving is the giving of thanks to God, especially in a religious ceremony.
